hansen 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Bernheim, Meer, and Novarro (2016) Dataset on Liquor Consumption and Commitment Opportunities

    bmn2016.Rd

    Liquor sale hours, alcohol consumption, and related state policies across 47 U.S. states from 1970 to 2007. The dataset includes off-premises and on-premises sales data for beer, wine, and liquor, along with other socioeconomic variables.

    bmn2016

    Format

    A data frame with 1,722 observations and multiple variables related to liquor sales and policies.

    id

    Unique identifier for each observation

    state

    State name

    year

    Year of observation

    beeroffweekday

    Beer sales off-premises on weekdays

    beerofffri

    Beer sales off-premises on Fridays

    beeroffsat

    Beer sales off-premises on Saturdays

    beeroffsun

    Beer sales off-premises on Sundays

    wineoffweekday

    Wine sales off-premises on weekdays

    wineofffri

    Wine sales off-premises on Fridays

    wineoffsat

    Wine sales off-premises on Saturdays

    wineoffsun

    Wine sales off-premises on Sundays

    liqoffweekday

    Liquor sales off-premises on weekdays

    liqofffri

    Liquor sales off-premises on Fridays

    liqoffsat

    Liquor sales off-premises on Saturdays

    liqoffsun

    Liquor sales off-premises on Sundays

    beeronweekday

    Beer sales on-premises on weekdays

    beeronfri

    Beer sales on-premises on Fridays

    beeronsat

    Beer sales on-premises on Saturdays

    beeronsun

    Beer sales on-premises on Sundays

    wineonweekday

    Wine sales on-premises on weekdays

    wineonfri

    Wine sales on-premises on Fridays

    wineonsat

    Wine sales on-premises on Saturdays

    wineonsun

    Wine sales on-premises on Sundays

    liqonweekday

    Liquor sales on-premises on weekdays

    liqonfri

    Liquor sales on-premises on Fridays

    liqonsat

    Liquor sales on-premises on Saturdays

    liqonsun

    Liquor sales on-premises on Sundays

    beerethvol

    Beer ethanol volume

    wineethvol

    Wine ethanol volume

    liqethvol

    Liquor ethanol volume

    beerage18

    Legal beer drinking age 18

    beerage19

    Legal beer drinking age 19

    beerage20

    Legal beer drinking age 20

    beerage21

    Legal beer drinking age 21

    wineage18

    Legal wine drinking age 18

    wineage19

    Legal wine drinking age 19

    wineage20

    Legal wine drinking age 20

    wineage21

    Legal wine drinking age 21

    liqage18

    Legal liquor drinking age 18

    liqage19

    Legal liquor drinking age 19

    liqage20

    Legal liquor drinking age 20

    liqage21

    Legal liquor drinking age 21

    unempw

    Unemployment rate

    popover18

    Population over 18

    beereth

    Beer ethanol content

    wineeth

    Wine ethanol content

    liqeth

    Liquor ethanol content

    logliq

    Log of liquor sales

    logwine

    Log of wine sales

    logbeer

    Log of beer sales

    expand

    Indicator for expansion of sales

    restrict

    Indicator for restriction of sales

    liqoffsunp

    Liquor off-premises sales on Sundays (percentage)

    liqonsunp

    Liquor on-premises sales on Sundays (percentage)

    beeroffinflows

    Beer off-premises inflows

    wineoffinflows

    Wine off-premises inflows

    liqoffinflows

    Liquor off-premises inflows

    beeroninflows

    Beer on-premises inflows

    wineoninflows

    Wine on-premises inflows

    liqoninflows

    Liquor on-premises inflows

    liqonoutflows

    Liquor on-premises outflows

    liqoffoutflows

    Liquor off-premises outflows

    beeronoutflows

    Beer on-premises outflows

    beeroffoutflows

    Beer off-premises outflows

    wineonoutflows

    Wine on-premises outflows

    wineoffoutflows

    Wine off-premises outflows

    liqonnotsun

    Liquor on-premises sales not on Sundays

    liqoffnotsun

    Liquor off-premises sales not on Sundays

    everonchange

    Indicator for any change in on-premises sales

    everoffchange

    Indicator for any change in off-premises sales

    winetax

    Wine tax

    liquortax

    Liquor tax

    beertax

    Beer tax

    cigtax

    Cigarette tax

    barsmokingban

    Ban on smoking in bars

    restsmokingban

    Ban on smoking in restaurants

    Source

    Bernheim, B. D., Meer, J., & Novarro, N. K. (2016). "Do Consumers Exploit Commitment Opportunities? Evidence from Natural Experiments Involving Liquor Consumption." American Economic Journal: Economic Policy, 8(1), 41-69. Data available at https://www.aeaweb.org/articles?id=10.1257/pol.20130351
